data.scheme_name: Procurement and Marketing Support (PMS) Scheme  - Participation in trade fairs/exhibitions  - Male, Others  - General, OBC  - Except NER  - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides 80% reimbursement for space rent upto max. of Rs. 1.50 lakh.
data.eligibility: All existing micro and small enterprises having Udyam Registration Certificate are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Applicant units shall have to submit their claim online (or system in place) in the prescribed format within 30 days from date of conclusion of the event. 
  2. MSE would be allowed reimbursement for maximum of 2 event in a year.
data.beneficiaries: All existing micro and small enterprises having Udyam Registration Certificate are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Applicant units shall have to submit their claim online (or system in place) in the prescribed format within 30 days from date of conclusion of the event. 
  2. MSE would be allowed reimbursement for maximum of 2 event in a year.
data.context: This scheme is introduced to o create awareness and educate the MSMEs about importance / methods/process of packaging in marketing.
data.objective: The main aim is to promote new market access initiatives like organizing / participation in National / International Trade Fairs / Exhibitions / MSME Expo, etc. held across ttre country.
data.description:
Scheme provides reimbursement for Participation of Individual MSEs in Trade Fairs / Exhibitions in the following manner : 

  1. Space rent charges : 80% reimbursement 
  2. Contingency expenditure : 100% contingency expenditure subject to maximum Rs. 0.25 lakh or actual, whichever is less. 
  3. Maximum reimbursement cap would be: Metro & A class cities : Rs 1.50 lakh (incl. all taxes) max or actual, whichever is less for a participating enterprise per event. 
  4. Other cities : Rs. 0.80 lakh (incl. all taxes) max or actual, whichever is less for a parti.cipating enterprise per event.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link : https://my.msme.gov.in/MyMsme/Reg/COM_MatuDomAppForm.aspx
data.funding_mechanism: Applicant units shall have to submit their claim online in the prescribed format within 30 days of the event.
data.additional_info: It offers 100% subsidy on built up space rent paid for SC/ ST/women/ NER/ PH /Aspirational District units on minimum stall size of the event for MSE.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Application Form
2. Declaration
3. Pre-receipt
4. Affidavit
5. Undertaking
6. Copy of UDYAM Regn- Certilicate 
7. CLAIM FORM
8. Copy of Aadhaar Card(s) (Director(s)/ Proprietor/ Partners)
9. Copy of GST Registration Certificate
10. Other related documents (PAN card)
data.checklist_info_d:
